about_the_game:
COOP ENABLED DEMO!

This is a short taster of the start of the game - the adventure begins before our hero gains her powers, so co-operative mode takes a little while to get to.

FEAR NOT! We have included a 'skip to powers' option at the start, for those who would like to get stuck in.

Those who are here for the story can play the full demo as they wish!

CUTE CATS!

Amidst a heist gone wrong, Mittens — the world's greatest (and most literal) cat burglar — finds herself caught in a quantum experiment, and gains incredible powers.

With the help of her friends and some new quantum tricks up her sleeve, Mittens must puzzle her way through the secretive research facility, uncover the truth, and make it home before breakfast.

FUN PUZZLES!

The game is based around a central quantum mechanic — at the press of a button Mittens can split into two cats, who can each be controlled to solve puzzles and cause trouble.

As long as no one is looking, Mittens can exist in two places at once — if she's observed, however, things start to get theoretical...

QUANTUM MADNESS!

Being theoretical lets you pass through doors (that could theoretically have opened), and avoid detection by security (you can't detect what doesn't exist).

It does have drawbacks however - you can't use items or interact with the world until your quantum twin is no longer observed - then you can go back to both being plausible quantum possibilities.

Use your powers to access the inaccessible, evade the inevitable, and heist the unheistable to become Schrodinger's Cat Burglar!

A QUANTUM ADVENTURE THAT'S ONE OF A KIND!

name: Schrodinger's Cat Burglar Demo
short_description: Portal with cats - a puzzle heist adventure with a quantum flavour! Mittens the cat stumbles into a quantum experiment and gains incredible new powers - the ability to be in two places at once. Explore, solve logic puzzles and evade capture by pest control robots to ultimately save the day!
